original_text: Moreover Uzziah had an host of fighting men, that went out to war by bands, according to the number of their account by the hand of Jeiel the scribe and Maaseiah the ruler, under the hand of Hananiah, one of the king's captains.
korean_text: 웃시야에게 또 싸우는 군사가 있으니 서기관 여이엘과 병영장 마아세야가 직접 조사한 수효대로 왕의 지휘관 하나냐의 휘하에 속하여 떼를 지어 나가서 싸우는 자라

sentences.original_text: Moreover Uzziah had an host of fighting men
that went out to war by bands
according to the number of their account
by the hand of Jeiel the scribe

sentences.korean_translation: 그는 왕의 장관 중 한 사람이었다
